image_1.description: Platform Nine and Three-Quarters is the magical platform at King's Cross from which the Hogwarts Express departs.

image_2.description: Hogwarts Castle is the main setting of the story, where the students arrive and where the Sorting Ceremony takes place.
image_2.reason: The image depicts a grand architectural structure that matches the description of Hogwarts Castle in the text. The ornate and majestic entrance, along with the intricate carvings and stonework, aligns with the description of the castle's entrance hall and staircase. The presence of flaming torches and the overall atmosphere of awe and mystery further support this match.
